## Purpose

This script extracts raw IPUMS data and renames it by survey year for consistent file organization.

## Setup

```{r setup}
#| label: setup
#| include: true

# Load required libraries
library(haven)      # for reading/writing Stata files
library(readxl)     # for reading xlsx files
library(openxlsx)    # for writing xlsx files

```

## Data Extraction Process

### Load Source Data

```{r load-data}
#| label: load-source-data

# Load the source IPUMS data file
data_2000 <- read_dta("data/source/your_file_name_here.dta")


write.xlsx(data_2000, "data/outcome/2000.xlsx")

```
